# Summary

It would be convenient to click on a model and have the user camera follow it. 

# Motivation

Helps debugging models moving in large environments

# Describe alternatives you've considered

* Right-click  model -> follow / ESC to leave
* Follow service that can be called from command line
* Setup follow from startup through SDF's [track_visual](http://sdformat.org/spec?ver=1.6&elem=world#camera_track_visual) tag

# Additional context

* [Tutorial](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo_tutorials/pull-requests/299/new-tutorial-on-track_visual/diff) for feature on Gazebo classic
* [Feature request](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/subt/issues/130/some-suggestions-for-useful-ui) on SubT
* [Camera tracking](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-rendering/pull-requests/38/support-camera-tracking-and-following/diff) on ign-rendering
* [Camera tracking](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gui/pull-requests/74/camera-tracking-advanced-settings/diff) on ign-gui
